task.title: Removing Front Wheels
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step procedure for safely removing front wheels while maintaining proper component organization.

step.cmd: Unscrew the castle nut and remove the spindle washer.
Remove the wheel from the spindle.

taskbody.result: The front wheel will now be completely detached.

postreq.note: When reassembling, ensure cones and lock nuts are replaced on their original spindles to prevent thread damage. Left-hand threads are on the left spindle and right-hand threads on the right spindle when facing the car.
